item.title: Assignment Operator: <<-
item.description: The <<- Assignment Operator ### Today I learned about the <<- operator. It’s similar to the << operator. But how is it different? Let’s take a look shall we? Educators ## Largely, the R documentation, along with some experimentation. However, a co-working teaching an ‘intro’ class brought its existance to my attention. Documentation Let’s begin with the R documentation. help("assignOps") Here we see: The operators <<- and ->> are normally only used in functions, and cause a search to be made through parent environments for an existing definition of the variable being assigned.
